value: We manufacture a wide range of HDPE and LDPE bottles suitable for various industries. Each product is crafted with precision and undergoes rigorous quality checks to ensure excellence.
High-density polyethylene bottles perfect for medicines, tablets, capsules, and syrups. FDA approved, tamper-proof, and available in various sizes from 30ml to 1000ml.
FDA Approved | Tamper Proof | Child Resistant | UV Protected
Low-density polyethylene bottles ideal for edible oils, honey, sauces, beverages, and liquid food products. Food-safe certified and BPA-free.
Food Grade | BPA Free | Leak Proof | Squeezable
Elegant and durable bottles for shampoos, lotions, body wash, and beauty products. Available in various colors and designs with custom labeling options.
Elegant Design | Custom Colors | Pump Compatible | Recyclable
Heavy-duty bottles for industrial chemicals, cleaning agents, laboratory reagents, and agricultural products. Chemical resistant and durable.
Chemical Resistant | Heavy Duty | Wide Mouth | UN Approved
Polyethylene terephthalate bottles for beverages, water, juices, and carbonated drinks. Crystal clear, lightweight, and 100% recyclable.
Crystal Clear | Lightweight | 100% Recyclable | Carbonation Safe
Customized bottle solutions tailored to your specific requirements. We offer custom shapes, sizes, colors, and labeling to match your brand identity.
Custom Design | Brand Colors | Logo Printing | Any Size
